长袍(chiton)，衣褶雅丽，质料柔软，都系丝织衣料。

derivation.yuyuan_name: from Greek khitōn 'tunic'. Sense 2 is a modern Latin genus name

means.word_mean: 1. a woolen tunic worn by men and women in ancient Greece
2. primitive elongated bilaterally symmetrical marine mollusk having a mantle covered with eight calcareous plates

auth_sentence.content: Two of the species a sea urchin and a mollusk called a chiton would annihilate the algae when present in high numbers.
